translations.chinese: 羽以故無西意，而北擊齊。
translations.english: Xiang Yu therefore had no intention of going west, but instead attacked Qi to the north.

translations.chinese: 九月，漢王遣將軍薛歐、王吸出武關，因王陵兵，從南陽迎太公、呂后於沛。
translations.english: In the ninth month, King Han sent generals Xue Ou and Wang Xi out of Wuguan, relying on Wang Ling's troops, going from Nanyang to welcome the Duke of Tai and Empress Lü from Pei.

translations.chinese: 羽聞之，發兵距之陽夏，不得前。
translations.english: Xiang Yu heard of this and sent troops to block them at Yangxia, preventing them from advancing.

translations.chinese: 二年冬十月，項羽使九江王布殺義帝於郴。
translations.english: In the tenth month of winter in the second year, Xiang Yu ordered King Jiujiang Ying Bu to kill Righteous Emperor Huai at Chen.

translations.chinese: 陳餘亦怨羽獨不王己，從田榮藉助兵，以擊常山王張耳。
translations.english: Chen Yu also resented that Xiang Yu alone did not enfeoff him as king. He borrowed troops from Tian Rong and attacked King Changshan Zhang Er.
